CommonRulesShared.CashWallet: "Cash Wallet" displays the cash available for wager.
CommonRulesShared.BackAction: Tap to leave the game and go back to the previous page.
CommonRulesShared.GameHistoryDescription: Shows details of the previous games played. Scroll down to the end to load more records.
CommonRulesShared.GameHistoryActionWithIcon: Tapto select the dates of games to be shown in History.
CommonRulesShared.ReturnToPlayerDescription: The theoretical return to player (RTP) for this game is %{rtpValue}. This RTP represents the long-term statistical percentage of total stakes in the game that is paid out as winnings over time. The RTP value is calculated by dividing the total winnings by the total stakes from a simulation of numerous game rounds.
CommonRulesShared.AdditionInfoMalfunctionDescription: Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
CommonRulesShared.AdditionInfoInactiveGameSessions: The game will automatically return to its initial state after being idle for %{dayCount} days. Progress and status of any collection games, unfinished free games, and unfinished feature games etc will no longer be retained.
CommonRulesShared.AdditionInfoInactiveGameSessionsHour: The game will automatically return to its initial state after being idle for %{hourCount} hours. Progress and status of any collection games, unfinished free games, and unfinished feature games etc will no longer be retained.
CommonRulesShared.AdditionInfoDisputeHistoryDescription: In the event of disputes over game results, all game results that are shown in the game history page are absolute and final.
CommonRulesShared.AdditionInfoInactiveGameSessionsAlternat: In the event that a game round is interrupted due to network disconnection, technical issues, or if the player intentionally exits, the game round will remain valid and will not be forfeited. The incomplete round will resume from the point of interruption during the player's next game session.

SlotRulesShared.BetSize: The Bet Size is set using the "Bet Size" selector.
SlotRulesShared.BetLevel: The Bet Level is set using the "Bet Level" selector.
SlotRulesShared.BetAmount: The Bet Amount is set using the "Bet Amount" selector.
SlotRulesShared.AutoSpinPlays: "Auto Spin" automatically plays the game for a selected number of rounds.
SlotRulesShared.PayoutAccordingToPaytable: Winning combinations and payouts are made according to the "Paytable".
SlotRulesShared.FastStopAction: Tap the button or the game area during a spin to stop the reels.
SlotRulesShared.HoldSpaceBarAction: Press and Hold <Space> key will continue game spins until it is released.
SlotRulesShared.SpaceBarStopReelAction: When the reels are spinning, press the <Space> key to skip the reels spinning animation and reveal the reel results (subject to internet connection stability).
SlotRulesShared.SpaceBarOneButtonAction: Whenever there is exactly one on-screen button available to press, press the <Space> key to activate the button.
SlotRulesShared.StopAutoSpinAction: Tap to stop Auto Spin. The number on the button indicates the remaining number of spins for Auto Spin.
SlotRulesShared.StopAutoSpinMoreOptions: Tap on More to display more options for Auto Spin.
SlotRulesShared.AutoSpinPlayDescription: Auto Spin automatically plays the game for a selected number of spins.
SlotRulesShared.SelectAutoSpinRound: Tap on the values to select number of Auto Spins.
SlotRulesShared.StopAutoSpinIfWinExceed: Stop Auto Spin if a single win exceeds (value specified by player): Auto Spin is automatically disabled when a single win exceeds this value.
SlotRulesShared.StopAutoSpinIfBalanceIncrease: Stop Auto Spin if balance increases by (value specified by player): Auto Spin is automatically disabled when the balance is increased by this value (in reference to the balance when the Auto Spin is initiated).
SlotRulesShared.StopAutoSpinIfBalanceDecrease: Stop Auto Spin if balance decreases by (value specified by player): Auto Spin is automatically disabled when the balance is decreased by this value (in reference to the balance when the Auto Spin is initiated).
SlotRulesShared.BetSizeAction: Bet Size: Scroll to select the Bet Size.
SlotRulesShared.BetLevelAction: Bet Level: Scroll to select the Bet Level.
SlotRulesShared.BetAmountAction: Bet Amount: Scroll to select the Bet Amount.
SlotRulesShared.MaxBetAction: Max Bet: Tap to set Bet Size and Bet Level to maximum value.
SlotRulesShared.MaxBetButtonAction: Tap to set Bet Size and Bet Level to maximum value.
SlotRulesShared.BetAmountTap: Tap to display the Bet Options.
SlotRulesShared.SoundAction: Tap to turn sound ON or OFF.
SlotRulesShared.GameRuleAction: Shows the game rules and button functions.
SlotRulesShared.CloseAction: Tap to return to the Main Game.
SlotRulesShared.TurboSpinAction: Tap to enable or disable the Turbo Spin to reduce the duration of reel spins in the main game.
SlotRulesShared.MinusAction: Tap to reduce the Bet Amount.
SlotRulesShared.PlusAction: Tap to increase the Bet Amount.
SlotRulesShared.WalletBalanceAction: Tap to display the balance of available wallets.
SlotRulesShared.WinAmountAction: Tap to display the Game History.
SlotRulesShared.FreeGameCountDesc: Shows the remaining number of free games.
SlotRulesShared.RolloverBalanceDesc: Shows the remaining balance to achieve the roll-over's requirement.
SlotRulesShared.FeatureBuyDesc1: Tap on Feature Buy button to open the Feature Buy menu.
SlotRulesShared.FeatureBuyDesc2: Tap on Start button to buy the Free Spins Feature at the price displayed in the Feature Buy menu.
SlotRulesShared.UserProfileAction: Tap to display the balance of available wallets and additional settings

SlotRulesBetLineRelated.WinDetailBreakdown: A bet line win in cash is equal to the value shown in the "Paytable" multiplied by the bet size and bet level.
SlotRulesBetLineRelated.HighestWinIsPaid: Only the highest win per bet line is paid.
SlotRulesBetLineRelated.WinFromLeftmost: Bet lines win if the winning symbols are in succession from the leftmost reel to the right.
SlotRulesBetLineRelated.SimultanuousWin: Simultaneous wins on different bet lines are added.
SlotRulesBetLineRelated.SpinAction: Tap to start spin at the current Bet Lines, Bet Size and Bet Level.
SlotRulesBetLineRelated.PressSpaceAction: Press the <Space> key to start spin at the current Bet Lines, Bet Size and Bet Level.

SlotRulesBetWaysRelated.WinDetailBreakdown: A bet way win in cash is equal to the value shown in the "Paytable"  multiplied by the bet size and bet level.
SlotRulesBetWaysRelated.BetWaysWin: Bet ways win if the winning symbols are in succession from the leftmost reel to the right.
SlotRulesBetWaysRelated.TotalOfBetWaysWin: Total number of winning bet ways for each symbol are calculated by multiplying the number of adjacent winning symbols on each symbols from the leftmost reel to the right.
SlotRulesBetWaysRelated.WinningSymbolPayout: The winning symbol payout is multiplied by the number of winning bet ways.
SlotRulesBetWaysRelated.SimultaneousWin: Simultaneous wins on different bet ways are added.

SlotRulesBaseBetRelated.SpinAction: Tap to start spin at the current Base Bet, Bet Size and Bet Level.
SlotRulesBaseBetRelated.PressSpaceAction: Press the <Space> key to start spin at the current Base Bet, Bet Size and Bet Level.
